Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: NetConfig network switch configuration manager

Features:
- Device management with Huawei S5720 and HP 1900 support
- SSH connectivity via Netmiko
- Configuration collection and analysis
- Config comparison between devices
- MAC address search
- Web interface with real-time progress via WebSocket
- Credential management with encryption
- Bulk device import

EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add device selection and bulk deletion feature

- Add checkboxes to device table for selection
- Add select all/none functionality with header checkbox
- Add "Delete Selected" button with count indicator
- Add POST /api/devices/bulk-delete endpoint
- Button only appears when devices are selected
- Confirmation dialog shows list of devices to delete

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
